about_the_game:
A short FPS game.
The game is a free add-on for the base game.

How to play
You can select this game when you press "PLAY" on the Steam application.

Features of this DLC game
The purpose of this mini-game is to get to the goal of the dungeon.
However, you must escort your companion, Rena.
Let's defeat the enemy with a self-defense revolver.

Winning conditions
Reach the goal with Rena.

Terms of defeat
Player's HP drops to zero.
Rena's HP drops to zero.

Rena, the companion, automatically follows the player.
Rena automatically uses recovery magic against the player.
However, once Rena's MP reaches zero, she can no longer use the recovery magic.

Operations
Move: W, A, S, D
​Jump: Spacebar
​Run: Shift key
​Weapon targeting: Hold down Right Mouse button
​Attack with a weapon: Left Mouse Click
Reload the revolver: R

If you don't want this DLC game, uncheck the DLC checkbox in the Steam app.

content_descriptors.notes: There is an expression in which the player character fires a gun.
